overview:
Possessing more than 17 years of experience in the technology industry and more than 15 years as CEO, President and Co-founder of Redapt, Inc., Rick Cantu brings a deep understanding of business development and entrepreneurial knowledge, successfully leading the overall direction of the company.

Originally from the greater Seattle area, Rick began his career at Apex Computer Technology. He previously held partial ownership and a board position with the Seattle Sounders from 2001 until 2008. During this time he was instrumental in bringing the Real Madrid game to Seattle, Wash. Currently he holds an advisory role with Rezin Sports Marketing.
